description.value:
As a harengon, you have the following ancestral traits.

Size. You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

Speed. Your walking speed is 30 feet.

Creature Type. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.mk8IZL9OFaPBN0db]{Creature Type} You are a Humanoid.

Hare-Trigger. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.jjdQJIertEWISwUC]{Hare-Trigger} You can add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

Escape Artist. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.jlB1ss4js2rqAayj]{Escape Artist} You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the immobilized, grappled, prone, and restrained conditions.

Lucky Footwork. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.QrVRHMUsI0goTH4m]{Lucky Footwork} When you fail a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a d4 and add it to the save, potentially turning the failure into a success. You can't use this reaction if you're prone or your speed is 0.

Rabbit Hop. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.nIhRRkDBB1ap5a2X]{Rabbit Hop} As a bonus action, you can jump a number of feet equal to five times your proficiency bonus, without provoking opportunity attacks. You can use this trait only if you are not immobilized. Once you use this bonus action, you can't do so again until you complete a short or long rest.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
